commenter_a: No one is saying we cant police our borders...but we must do so with Constitutionally appropriate actions. After all isnt it our CONSTITUTION that we are protecting, that we are asking out service member to protect with their lives. It makes no sense to me that we are willing to throw out the very basis of our great country because we are so fearful. We must be strong and remember our core values.
post_message: Trump is keeping his promise! I don’t care how much liberals scream and protest… A NATION HAS A RIGHT TO POLICE ITS BORDERS, ESPECIALLY FROM VIOLENT CRIMINALS!   LET'S get 10,000 SHARES for our President! No Judge Can STOP His plans To Make America GREAT AGAIN!
